stepAnswer: at least 20%, when in fact, it is less than 20%.
stepTitle: The Type I error is to conclude that the percent of EVC students who attended is $$___$$.
stepBody: Choose the best answer from the following.
choices: at least 20%, when in fact, it is less than 20%.
less than 20%, when in fact, it is at least 20%.
less than 20%, when in fact, it is less than 20%.
